name: Bavarian Adventure
description:
A fantasy adventure platformer through the castles and towns of Bavaria. Have some pretzel throwing, smashing, jumping fun! Play offline if you have no internet access.

Features
- 50 Levels across 7 beautiful locations in Bavaria
- Bright colourful vector graphics
- Smash blocks and ropes with Pretzels
- Jump on the heads of enemies or destroy them with Pretzels
- Levels with logic puzzles
- Collect coins to unlock extra characters
- Ride on blimps, boats and in Mad King Ludwig’s coaches
- Use bombs to explode walls
- Teleport from place to place
- Fly using a jetpack

Come and start exploring now!

Controls

Left, Right = move left/right 

Up = Jump

Space = Throw Pretzels
